parameters.name: CenId
parameters.description: The ID of the Cloud Enterprise Network (CEN) instance.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description:
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

You can use the client to generate the value, but you must make sure that it is unique among all requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters.

>  If you do not set this parameter, ClientToken is set to the value of RequestId. The value of RequestId for each API request may be different.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description:
The description of the flow log.

The description must be 2 to 256 characters in length. It must start with a letter but cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: FlowLogId
parameters.description: The ID of the flow log.

parameters.name: FlowLogName
parameters.description:
The name of the flow log.

The name must be 2 to 128 characters in length, and can contain letters, digits, periods (.), underscores (\_), and hyphens (-). The name must start with a letter but cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: LogStoreName
parameters.description:
The name of the Logstore where the flow log is stored.

The name must be 3 to 63 characters in length, and can contain lowercase letters, digits, underscores (\_), and hyphens (-). It must start or end with a lowercase letter or a digit.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Minimum value: **1**. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: ProjectName
parameters.description:
The name of the project where the flow log is stored.

The name must be 3 to 63 characters in length, and can contain lowercase letters, digits, and hyphens (-). It must start or end with a lowercase letter or a digit.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The ID of the region where the flow log is deployed.

You can call the [DescribeChildInstanceRegions](~~132080~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the flow log. Valid values:

*   **Active**: The flow log is enabled.
*   **Inactive**: The flow log is disabled.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description:
The information about the tags.

You can specify at most 20 tags in each call.

parameters.name: TransitRouterAttachmentId
parameters.description: The ID of the network instance connection.
